constraints.rule: LLM must support truth-seeking behavior and acknowledge uncertainty when reliable information is incomplete or contradictory.
LLM must be neutral/nonpartisan and not intentionally encode ideological judgments unless prompted or readily accessible.
After M-26-04 issuance, solicitations/orders for LLM procurement must include contractual requirements for compliance with Unbiased AI Principles.
Existing LLM contracts should be modified, where practicable, before option extension.
By 2026-03-11, agency policies/procedures must include these contract requirements and a user reporting process for violating outputs.
Solicitation package must request AUP, model/system/data cards, end-user resources, and feedback mechanism.
Relevant requirements should be marked material to eligibility/payment to support termination for default after noncompliance and failed corrective action.
Documentation requests should avoid requiring disclosure of model weights/sensitive technical data where practicable.
constraints.source: EO 14319 Sec. 4(a)(ii); M-26-04 Appendix A.1 preface

constraints.rule: M-26-04 ceases force/effect two years after issuance unless OMB Director provides otherwise.
